comment: Neat class. We got to play instruments and had discussions on different music genres. The homework is time consuming but it only lasts for half the semester i think. You have to attend 3 concerts over the semester and write papers about them.

I took Prof Tighe for Honors Music 1107, and it was my best class of the semester. He takes into consideration students beginner status with music (if applicable) and is very flexible with assignments. All he really wants from the students is interest and participation. He wants you to do homework for the first few weeks but that's it.

He is soooo cool. We only had like one group project that was super easy. The lectures could gear more towards student participation but other than that I like it. As long as you do the tutorials and the inquizatives you'll pass.

Best professor ever. He cares about your performance. He makes work easy. He doesn't like exams, so the graded work in the course is mostly projects and essays. He is also an easy grader. Honestly, I can't share enough about how much I like this teacher. He makes class fun.

A genuinely caring and kind professor. Even when there were some mishaps throughout the year, Professor Tighe always went out of his way to rectify any issue. He even took full responsibility and apologized for certain issues. A professor without an ego the same size as the moon? I already love em and if you take him, I'm sure you'll love him too.

While I enjoyed the class activities and what we learned, I did not enjoy the lack of organization. His assignments were all over the place. The directions for some were confusing, so when we asked for clarification, he changed the entire assignment during class time without a written follow up. Though, he posted useful content for the future. 3/5
rating_tags: Participation matters--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: Mr. Tighe is a great professor with easy assignments and one large final paper. He makes the class personal, which is more than I can say for a lot of professors.

Professor Tighe is so enthusiastic and really cares about his students. He will definitely make you do some crazy things but it helps you step out of your comfort zone. This class is an easy A, just make sure to come to class! There are not many grades except a midterm, an outside project, and 3 lesson plans!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures--Caring

comment: I LOVED this course. Professor Tighe will get you out of your comfort zone but you will love this course. Only thing he is strict on is attendance. If you come to class and truly try you will make an easy A. He really knows his music and you will learn so much about how to incorporate it into your classroom. I truly enjoyed this class.

Professor Tighe is new to Kennesaw State, but he is an amazing man! He is very dedicated when it comes to helping his students, and wants the best. Something I would like to let you know is that he makes getting out of your comfort zone something you will not regret. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE take him, it is an easy A, and very interactive.
